sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我喜欢运动，例如跑步和游泳。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan yùndòng, lìrú pǎobù hé yóuyǒng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime le sport, par exemple la course et la natation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like sports, for example running and swimming.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ xìnxī fā gěi wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez m'envoyer les informations.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please send me the information.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 从这里到机场有三十公里。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Cóng zhèlǐ dào jīchǎng yǒu sānshí gōnglǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a trente kilomètres d'ici à l'aéroport.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's thirty kilometers from here to the airport.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez expliquer ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please explain this problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们讨论一下这个计划。
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Discutons de ce plan.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's discuss this plan.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les Chinois mangent des raviolis pour le Nouvel An.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Chinese people eat dumplings for New Year.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet objet est très bon marché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This thing is very cheap.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mieux vaut sortir se promener que rester à la maison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's better to go out for a walk than stay at home.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我在街上碰到了老朋友。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài jiē shàng pèngdào le lǎo péngyou.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai rencontré un vieil ami dans la rue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I ran into an old friend on the street.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Deux plus deux égale quatre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Two plus two equals four.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 每个人都有自由的权利。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yǒu zìyóu de quánlì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chacun a le droit à la liberté.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone has the right to freedom.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis d'accord avec ton point de vue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I agree with your point of view.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我有一个请求想跟你说。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ yǒu yī gè qǐngqiú xiǎng gēn nǐ shuō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai une demande à te faire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have a request to make to you.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qùnián wǒ qù le Rìběn lǚyóu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'année dernière, je suis allé au Japon en voyage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Last year I went to Japan for travel.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Puis-je m'asseoir ici ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: May I sit here?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng hē yī bēi kāfēi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais boire un café.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to drink a cup of coffee.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bonjour à tous !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hello everyone!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma grande sœur travaille à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My older sister works in Beijing.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils ont deux enfants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They have two children.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette fleur est très belle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This flower is very beautiful.
